_header: An angel came unto that maid
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; carols, Annunciation
_description: James Ryman (?), A carol of the Annunciation — six cross-rhymed quatrains (abab) and two-line burden with medial rhyme: ‘Mary so myld scripture seyeth þus / Hath borne a chyld namyd Ihesus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
An angelle came vnto thatte maydeAnd knelyd downe vppon his
                    kne…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Sche conceyued thatt tyme ful soneThe secunde persone in
                    trinite
CULEe112.Attributed Author: Not attributed to Ryman in MS.
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 292.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 181; 1977, 160.
